amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute made in order as original text for the purpose of amendment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A002) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Dreier.
